scripts.import: git pull origin develop && git flow init -d && npm install && git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/develop develop
scripts.push: git add . && ( git commit -m "$MSG" || echo "\033[1;33mWARNING:\033[m nothing to commit or commit message empty" ) && git push -u origin develop
scripts.feature:finish: git add . && git commit -m "feature finished" && git flow feature finish $NAME && npm run push
